description: The request was made by Parks Canada, the organisation are searching for One (1) the Propane Engine Driven Forklift Truck. The costumer also included in the requirement the delivery date for the characteristcs mentioned Good: March 31, 2023.
full_summary:
# Propane Engine Driven Forklift Truck Tender

## Request for Proposal: 5P300-22-0170/A
The Government of Canada has issued a request for proposal (RFP) for the procurement of One (1) Propane Engine Driven Forklift Truck. This requirement is a part of the Supply Arrangement (SA) E60HS-21FRKL/A.

## Details of the RFP
* **Contracting Authority**: Parks Canada
* **Contract Number**: 5P300-22-0170/A
* **Publication Date**: November 2, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: November 10, 2022, at 14:00 (Eastern Time)
* **Delivery Date**: March 31, 2023

## Scope of Work
The Forklift Truck must be equipped with a Propane Engine and meet the requirements of the specified uni-grade classification.

## Bidder Eligibility
Bidders must possess a valid Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A.

## Procurement Method
This procurement process is open only to suppliers that have been pre-qualified under the RFSA.

## Contact Information
For any questions or clarifications, please contact:

* Nicholas Moise
* Phone: 343-585-4589
* Email: [nicholas.moise@pc.gc.ca](mailto:nicholas.moise@pc.gc.ca)
* Address: 111 Water Street East, Cornwall, ON K6H 6S2, Canada

## Closing Dates and Submissions
Bidders must submit their proposals by the tender closing date and time specified above. Late proposals will not be accepted.

## Debriefing Process
Bidders who are dissatisfied with the results of the procurement process may request a debriefing within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their proposal was unsuccessful. Debriefings may be provided in writing, by telephone or in person.

The formatted output is in markdown format. I have omitted extraneous information as instructed, focusing on presenting the essential details of the tender announcement.
